caption: Filippo Pedrini (Italian, 1758–1844), The Death of Dido, ca. 1790. Pen and brown ink and brush and black ink wash over graphite on tan-washed laid paper, back with ruled(?) secondary support, mounted down; 20.3 × 29.1 cm. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Paul Varkell (x1992-118)
